text:
I found these two rain footage options that feel good to me in that they have a moderate amount of rainfall, not "too drippy", and they have a nice range of color with subtle movement behind. Anyone have thoughts on them?
<http://www.istockphoto.com/video/rain-on-windows-3-5585916?st=b8679b3>
<http://www.istockphoto.com/video/rain-in-the-night-41948688?st=c7504e8>

text: Not a fan of either of the "nature" or "manmade structure" clips he shared.
I like the new ones you pulled. I like  the "pitter patter" of the one with the greenery in the background, and in Dave B's reference. I'd be happy to share all three with him and see what he thinks.
I can post it up to Basecamp. Wanted to be sure guys you feel good about the options.
Cool. Anyone else weighing in? I'm down with sharing these.
Immersion supports wet t-shirt contests right?
they have a whole haptic themed bar in cancun
I wouldn't regret accidentally slipping that clip in with other options.
Okay, last call. I say go ahead and post the 3 non-embracing options for Dave B to check out.
